title: Bound
description: My life came with a vow. A promise to the blood line I’m born from.Even though I loved my family, I knew I could never escape. I’m bound to duty. Until she walks into my life. Blonde. Blue-eyed. Far too beautiful. I shouldn’t bring her into this life. My secrets are far too deadly. Promises will be broken, but deception is right at my door. Now I have a choice to make. Love or blood. *A dark romantic suspense standalone. BDSM themes run throughout this story.*
author: Dani René
